translations: [水利]水库（reservoir 的复数）；油箱；[分化]储液器；[贸易]储藏所；[昆]贮液囊

phrs.translation: 气藏；气田；煤气存储器；天然气储层
碳酸盐岩储层；碳酸盐岩油储
n. 储集岩；贮油岩；储油岩石
油贮；石油储集层；贮油柜
碎屑岩储集层；碎屑油储

sentences.sentence: Reservoirs are drying up and farmers have begun to leave their land in search of water.
sentences.translation: 水库正在干涸，农民开始离开田地去寻找水源。

sentences.sentence: Reservoirs of this hot rock collect in the base of the mantle.
sentences.translation: 这些热岩石的储层聚集在地幔的底部。

sentences.sentence: Tens of millions of people have been forced to move from their homes—often with little warning or compensation—to make way for the reservoirs behind dams.
sentences.translation: 数千万人被迫离开家园——通常没有任何预先通知或补偿——只为给水坝后面的水库腾地方。
